name: OI All In One Hair Milk for Softness and Shine
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is: A bestselling, multifunctional leave-in treatment milk that controls frizz while hydrating, protecting from heat, and softening, leaving hair shiny and silky..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.- Frizz.- Heat Protection.Key Benefits: - Controls frizz and prevents damage.- Promotes super-bright, soft hair.- Provides thermal protection up to 446u00b0F.Highlighted Ingredients:- Roucou Oil: Protects hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know: This hydrating, conditioning spray-on milk tames and detangles hair for a natural, smooth, shiny look. Itu2019s formulated with roucou oil (a source of beta-carotene and natural antioxidants), as well as deeply moisturizing provitamin B5 and a functional amino complex to promote resistance to stress.
ingredients: -Roucou Oil: Protects hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Parfum/Fragrance, Behentrimonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Cetyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Trideceth-5, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Trideceth-12, Cyclopentasiloxane, Citronellol, Geraniol, Phenoxyethanol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply 10 to 15 sprays to washed, towel-dried hair. .-Air-dry or blow-dry hair..-Depending on hair type, increase or decrease the number of sprays. .-For difficult-to-manage hair, apply after OI Conditioner for Softness and Shine (sold separately). .-If hair is very dehydrated, apply for a moisturizing finish, spraying onto palms to distribute evenly throughout lengths and ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My old hairstylist swore by Davines brand but there wasn't a rep in our area so she struggled to keep the products in stock at her salon. I always liked how my hair looked/felt when I left her place. Eventually I switched stylists because I moved and my new stylist hasn't even heard of Davines. Oh well.. Apparently I've been overdosing my hair with protein by using various repair products (Olaplex, K18, etc.). Don't do that!! If your hair is in need of repair, you need moisturizing products, NOT repair products. Leave repair to the professional stylists otherwise you will make your hair more brittle and increase breakage. I follow the Blowout Professor's hair routine (quality S&C, leave-in C, oil). I've been using Moroccan Oil for fine/thin hair these last few months. I redeemed some Sephora points to get this trial size when I saw the brand was now available on Sephora (huge shock but YAY!!). MAJOR difference in my hair overall upon using this oil. The Blowout Professor routine made a major difference in my hair (the Living Proof PHD S&C are amazing btw), but switching to this oil has made an even bigger difference. Forget Moroccan Oil! Will be adding this one to my staples list!

reviews.review_title: A holy grail for my hair!

reviews.review_text: As someone who has struggled with dry and frizzy hair for years, I am always on the lookout for products that can help manage my unruly locks. This OI all-in-one milk leave-in treatment by Davines US comes in a sleek, matte black bottle with a pump dispenser, which I find incredibly convenient for controlling the amount of product I use. The minimalist design is both elegant and practical, making it a stylish addition to my bathroom shelf. The OI All In One Milk has a lightweight, milky texture that feels luxurious without being greasy. It distributes easily through my hair and absorbs quickly. The scent is divine u2014 a subtle, clean fragrance that lingers just long enough without being overpowering. Itu2019s refreshing and adds to the overall experience of using the product. I typically apply the milk to damp hair after washing. A few pumps are sufficient for my shoulder-length hair. Itu2019s incredibly versatile, working well whether I decide to air dry or blow-dry my hair. OI All In One Milk Leave-In Treatment by Davines US has become a staple in my hair care routine. It delivers on its promises of hydration, softness, and manageability, all while smelling fantastic. If youu2019re looking for a multi-functional leave-in treatment that truly makes a difference, I highly recommend giving this product a try. Itu2019s a small luxury that yields big results.
